p: The study was performed in accordance with the principles of Good Clinical Practice, the Declaration of Helsinki, and all the local regulations. The treatments with Direct-acting Antiviral Agents are applied according to criteria defined by national guidelines and are authorized by Italian Medicines Agency (AIFA). All patients provided their written informed consent to participate in this study. The study was approved by Comitato Etico Roma 2, S. Eugenio Hospital, Rome.
